DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see how long does the effect of a post-tetanic facilitation last on subsequent train-of-four. The investigators hypothesis is that the effect last at least 30 minutes.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of Post-tetanic Count on Subsequent Train-of-four During Recovery From Rocuronium
DOC.criteria: Patient having general anesthesia in dorsal decubitus with both arm available for at least an hour and a half Age >75 or <18 Neuromuscular disease difficult laryngoscopy predicted Allergy to rocuronium Malignant hyperthermia Full stomach Drugs the influence neuromuscular blockers Decision of the clinician to exclude his patient
